SearchOnewayFlight.description: Search for one way flights to the destination

required.origin_airport: The name of the airport or city to depart from
required.destination_airport: The name of the airport or city to arrive at

optional.number_of_tickets: the number of flight tickets for the trip
optional.airlines: The company that provides air transport services

result.number_of_tickets: the number of flight tickets for the trip
result.origin_airport: The name of the airport or city to depart from
result.destination_airport: The name of the airport or city to arrive at
result.is_nonstop: Whether the flight is a direct one
result.outbound_departure_time: Departure time of the flight flying to the destination
result.outbound_arrival_time: Arrival time of the flight flying to the destination
result.price: The total cost of the flight tickets
result.airlines: The company that provides air transport services

SearchRoundtripFlights.description: Search for roundtrip flights for the trip

required.origin_airport: The name of the airport or city to depart from
required.destination_airport: The name of the airport or city to arrive at

optional.number_of_tickets: the number of flight tickets for the trip
optional.airlines: The company that provides air transport services

result.number_of_tickets: the number of flight tickets for the trip
result.origin_airport: The name of the airport or city to depart from
result.destination_airport: The name of the airport or city to arrive at

result.outbound_departure_time: Departure time of the flight flying to the destination
result.outbound_arrival_time: Arrival time of the flight flying to the destination
result.inbound_arrival_time: Arrival time of the flight coming back from the trip
result.inbound_departure_time: Departure time of the flight coming back from the trip
result.price: The total cost of the flight tickets
result.airlines: The company that provides air transport services

FindHomeByArea.description: Search for a property to rent or buy in a given city

result.price: Sale price or per-month rent of property
